summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Alaska Street, from 32nd Avenue South to 35th Avenue South, of 32nd Avenue South from Edmunds Street to Alaska Street; and of 35th Avenue South from Edmunds Street to Alaska Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
